svg.desc: sagittal view of the vocal tract, also known as a face diagram

path.desc: upwards arrow (at right of center) above glottis for egressive glottalic airstream
upwards arrow (at right of center) below glottis for egressive pulmonic airstream
downwards arrow (at left of center) above glottis for ingressive glottalic airstream
upwards arrow below glottis for egressive pulmonic airstream
